Description:
Coriyule Stage 2 - 505m2
Stage 2 the Coriyule Estate Curlewis is located on the Bellarine Peninsula just 17kms from Geelong CBD and within close proximity to beaches, wineries, and all the amenities that Drysdale has to offer. The Bellarine rail trail is also right on your door step and the Clifton Springs marina is a short distance down the road. Our estate gives you the freedom to create without the frustrating restrictions developers often place on the new estates. The National Broadband Network (NBN) is active in the Coriyule Estate to provide you with highest quality internet experience. The deposit of only $5,000 is kept low to help you get into the market. This exciting release of land is now available with a range of block sizes. Secure your future home site today.

Description:
Sunnyside Downs on the Bellarine Peninsula
Architect designed stunning contemporary residence set on 5 acres with expansive sea views, solar heated swimming pool, flood lit mod grass tennis court.
Amazing north facing home filled with natural light & creative angles offers; Impressive entry, guest powder room, two living rooms (double sided French fireplace), modern gourmet kitchen and dining area opening to large outdoor patio/deck, study, four bedrooms plus main bedroom with en-suite , walk-in robe and private deck, 2nd bathroom plus large upstairs entertaining deck, wine cellar, vegetable garden, fenced paddock, fully landscaped garden, large shedding, town water, bore water, fruit tree orchard,15,000 ltr water tank & dam.
Very conveniently located close to local award winning wineries and restaurants, just 15minutes to Geelong CBD, 65 minutes to Melbourne,10 minutes to surf beach's and only a 5 minute stroll to Port Philip Bay.

Description:
Bellaview Estate - Stage 1 - Titled - 425m2
Baywater Estate and Bellaview Estate form part of the City of Greater Geelong Jetty Road Growth Area - 1,600 lots. The Baywater Estate (380 lots) abuts Port Phillip Bay and offers excellent views, the Bellaview Estate (151 lots) is adjacent to the new shopping precinct as proposed by the City of Greater Geelong. The Jetty Road Growth Area is generally bounded to the east by Jetty Road and Griggs Creek, to the west by McDermott Road, Port Phillip Bay to the north, and the Curlewis Golf Club to the south west and the Bellarine Rail Trail to the south.
The Jetty Road Growth Area is separated from the established residential areas of Drysdale/Clifton Springs by Griggs Creek. The proposed development of these estates will create a new connection to the existing residential areas and to the Clifton Springs Primary School on Jetty Road. Access will be made available via vehicular and pedestrian bridges which will provide access over Griggs Creek.
These estates are approximately 17km east of central Geelong.

Description:
'Benleigh'
Prestigious Bellarine Peninsula World Class Panoramic Views Over Corio Bay to You Yang's
110 Acres (44.5 Ha) of highly productive undulating country, shelter plantations
3 Bedroom family home with all amenities in parkland setting
Extensive shedding, garaging, office complex and stock yards
Securely watered by town water connected, large dam and rainwater storage. Natural gas available
Benleigh' one of the finest properties ever to be marketed on the Prestigious Bellarine Peninsula. Magnificent lifestyle and land-bank investment in a tightly held and capital appreciating region.
10 minutes Ocean Grove (surf beach), 15 minutes Queenscliff (ferry service), 15 minutes Geelong, 30 minutes Avalon Airport, 60 minutes Melbourne CBD & International Airport
* Expressions of Interest: Close Friday 21st October

Description:
Entertainers' Paradise on 5.5 Acres on the Bellarine Peninsula
$1.5 million
BELLARINE PENINSULA
Set amongst manicured, easy care gardens and boasting an array of entertaining areas, this superb luxury home of 65 squares is an absolute dream for the family that loves to entertain. Just 4 years old, with a land size of over 5 acres and stunning northern views over Corio Bay, this magnificent property will sweep you off your feet.
The delightful front garden features rose-lined avenues and lavender hedging, and a lovely bandstand gazebo to take in the view. Enter the home to find a vast open plan living area with formal dining, casual meals and a kitchen with absolutely everything - twin Miele ovens, twin dishwashers and a cappuccino machine make all your culinary exercises a breeze. Foldaway doors open onto a huge entertaining area fully equipped with built-in BBQ.
The parents' wing features a master bedroom with spa ensuite, walk-in robe and a sunny office or reading room with water views. A huge home theatre/music room has a separate bathroom and opens to a secluded 2nd outdoor terrace. The family wing includes a huge tiled bathroom, laundry, 3 big bedrooms with robes (1 with an ensuite), and an office or extra bedroom/living space. Zoned heating/cooling maintains the comfort levels throughout.
Also on this remarkable property, you'll find a tennis court; indoor pool and spa; enormous shed with kitchen, toilet and office; a tranquil feature dam, plus bore pump and on-site waste water recycling for water-wise garden maintenance. This incredible home truly has it all.

Address: 178 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
LIFESTYLE POSITION
Located only five minutes stroll from the Clifton Springs Golf Club where you can enjoy a relaxing meal out whilst taking in the panoramic views. If you are an early bird enjoy a round of golf on this sought after local course. Nearby is the well known Dell area of secluded beach perfect for youngsters and the young at heart. Quiet streets with established trees and gardens make this a truly sublime place to call home.
The home is of solid construction with great living space. The spacious north-facing lounge is light-filled with views to the bay. Open plan dining, family and kitchen areas with WIP have access to an exterior deck. There are three generous, queen sized bedrooms with WIR & ensuite or BIRs. Gas heating, split system air con and ceiling fans. The home has been well cared for by the current vendors but lends itself to some modern touches being added.
A large undercover area of approx 15mx5m, garage workshop and back garden give the home handy person the perfect outdoor area. Block size approx 604m2.
Inspection a must !

Description:
Easy Living Awaits In Leopold!
A carefree lifestyle awaits with public transport and sporting grounds an instant from your front door. The local playground and BBQ area are also a short walk away, while Melaluka Road grants easy access to the Gateway Sanctuary and expansive Gateway Plaza. Close access to Leopold P.S, Leopold Community Hub and the Leopold Library puts the practical elements in place for families.
The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone creates the spacious heart of the home, where the whole family can come together to share stories of their day. With two sliding doors opening onto the sheltered alfresco deck, which wraps around the north and western sides of the home, the elements are in place for casual outdoor living. The kitchen features an L-shaped island bench, built-in pantry and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, oven, gas cooktop, rangehood). The lounge provides yet another spot to kick back and unwind.
Zoned to the front of the home, the Master Bedroom is graced with a walk-in robe and en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom, while the laundry and separate toilet complete the layout. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling keep you comfortable in all seasons, while solar panels benefit both the environment and your bank account. Home to a lemon tree, the backyard provides a secure play space for children and pets alike. The oversized remote double lock-up garage features internal access.
When it comes to easy living, this home packs a punch! So if youre looking to secure a terrific family home or investment opportunity, youll need to act quickly to avoid disappointment!

Description:
AN IMPRESSIVE DENNIS FAMILY HOME WITH DUAL ACCESS AND STYLE.
Take the time to view this great home, with style and subtle colours combined to make this 2018 build sparkle. Light and bright throughout add to the warm appeal of this home. The open plan living space allows for dining, living and the best kitchen with butlers pantry and so well equipped , all opening to the undercover alfresco area where entertaining is easy. A second living room provides more space to relax. Four bedrooms, the main is really big enough for a retreat, has WIR and ensuite, the remaining three are all generous and all have WIR plus study too. Central bathroom with separate toilet and powder room, laundry to complete.
Features of the home include eco central heating and cooling, stone benches, dishwasher, loads of storage quality appliances and fittings as well as a double garage with internal access and another access with second garage./big shed.
Heritage Mews is a prime spot on the edge of the residential area with bush walks and bike rides all the way to Queenscliff along the Rail Trail and Lake Lorne for that daily walk ....no car, just around the corner. Schools are a short walk as well as access to the Village shops and all amenities. Take the stress out of building, make an appointment now.

Description:
SO MUCH TO OFFER..
Located in a quiet court 2 mins from the gateway plaza, this 7-year-old custom designed home is now seeking new owners to enjoy its livability. With quality fittings and designed to maximise natural light and space this beautiful home is sure to impress.
The hub of the home is the open plan living, dining and kitchen area which has been designed to make living easy. Featuring two wall-mounted ovens, a large walk-in pantry with adjustable shelves, a two drawer dishwasher, space for a fridge and a freezer, all complemented by an island bench with a breakfast bar. The adjacent very generous eating area features stacker/slider doors leading to the covered alfresco entertaining area, where you can enjoy summer BBQs and gatherings with family and friends.
The roomy main bedroom has a stylish ensuite and large walk-in robe, while the remaining two bedrooms feature built-in robes and are serviced by a large bathroom and separate toilet with its own hand basin.
A good-sized study is located adjacent to the living area and overlooks the front garden.
Ceiling fans and ducted gas heating throughout, together with reverse cycle air conditioning in the living area will keep you comfortable all year round.
Outside, there are attractive low maintenance gardens, two work sheds and three raised veggie beds now being prepared for new season crops.
With so much to offer an inspection is a must.
THIS COULD BE THE PERFECT HOME FOR YOU.

Description:
A Clifton Springs Gem
This Clifton Springs gem is an opportunity to secure property in this amazing bay side town that is within walking distance to everything and at an entry level price. This solid 3 bedroom property is an ideal first home or addition to your property portfolio, with a flexible floorplan to either keep as is or renovate and extend to create an amazing abode for your Bellarine lifestyle. A stroll down the road are the Clifton Springs Golf Club, Clifton Springs Bowling Club and The Dell, meaning summer afternoons on the Bellarine Peninsula can be enjoyed swimming, bowling, golfing or just sitting on the expansive north facing deck at the 19th for a quiet beverage overlooking the water at sunset. Call today for an inspection.

Description:
HOMELY, SAFE & SERENE OASIS
We are delighted to be offering private viewing opportunities for this beautiful property in which LJHâs Covid safe protocols will apply. Please phone Caroline Rickard your local agent to arrange your private tour and INITIALLY please also view our Video.
Sanctuary living and working from home, with office and workshop space. Be suitably impressed by this versatile and unique three bedroom family home immaculate throughout, HUGE 75M2 fully serviced garage, come tradesman's workshop &/or tradies storage facility for Boats, Trailers, Motorbikes, Jet Ski's & Caravan.
Many people are now looking for a private oasis away from the hustle and bustle that they can relax and enjoy in this interesting time that we find ourselves in. Clifton Springs is fast becoming a suburb of choice because of its affordability without losing any of the things we want to work, live & play.
Everyday facilities' from shopping to leisure are all in this space.
Behind the picket fence of this fantastic property are numerous creature comforts and practical living features to be appreciated. Where do I begin?
Enter this easily accessed all on one level, well-appointed and superbly maintained residence via the large and welcoming entry area, to a spacious L-shaped lounge and dining area.
This style of home was designed around the principal of family interaction within a generous kitchen, with room for the largest family size Fridge. With ample storage space, 900mm cooktop and room to move for more than one master-chef in the house whilst overlooking the lush external fern garden.
This lovely home provides three generously proportioned bedrooms including full ensuite and built in robe to the Master Suite, BIR to Bed 2, with Bed 3 featuring direct sliding door access to the undercover north facing Pergola oasis. Some may prefer to use this room as a study. The main bathroom includes updated shower and spa bath with separate vanity and storage cupboard. Located adjacent is the separate WC and well-proportioned laundry with direct access to the garden and rear yard.
The north facing private secluded rear yard features established and well maintained garden and invites you to sit around with family and friends and enjoy the serenity. All rear and side boundary fences are new and provide excellent privacy to this relaxing outlook over the landscaped area with more to enjoy in the mature protected fern garden on the west side of the property to cool the house from the afternoon sun.
Being conscious about how we care for our environment; the house includes power saving photovoltaic solar panels to reduce your energy bills and additional rainwater tanks to keep the gardens looking pristine and green (both tanks have pumps).
This property has it all. A HUGE 75m2 fully enclosed and secure 4 car garage with double garage doors and automation. All of this with direct access to a concrete driveway large enough for uninterrupted secure caravan storage with easy and direct street access.
Upon entry to this excellently appointed and practical property there's also a carport on driveway, so you're off street parking needs are catered for with a fenced and private front and rear yard, allowing you worry free security of your well-loved pets within the beautiful landscaped surrounds.
Due to COVID-19 Regulations, inspections are by appointment only. Wearing of masks and social distancing apply. Please contact Caroline Rickard on 0408-989221 to organise a private viewing inspection.

Description:
LARGE FAMILY HOME, PRIZED LOCATION
Properties compising this land area and location are sought after and quickly snapped up ! In close proximity to quality educational facilities and an expansive Drysdale shopping centre but with the space afforded a rural location. This spacious property has plenty of room for the big shed, tennis court and pool.
The home is of solid construction and just waiting to have a touch of modern flair added. Five generous-sized bedrooms - three upstairs and two downstairs. This home comes with two complete kitchens - downstairs has recently been renovated - allowing the opportunity for parents or older children to have their private living space. The living areas are generous and will accommodate any large family. Access to upstairs can be gained via internal and external stairs.
Features of the property include renovated laundry with plenty of storage, as-new gas HWS, massive under cover outdoor entertaining space, double garage and beautiful garden areas.

Description:
Titled Land in Boutique Waterway Estate!
Titled Land in Boutique Waterway Estate!
An outstanding opportunity presents to build in the central Drysdale area with convenient proximity to the town centre, schools, cafés and medical facilities. Bring your dream home to life on one of the last remaining titled vacant allotments in the area. With easy access to Geelong, now's the time to take advantage of the lifestyle benefitted by living on the Bellarine. Snap up this 574m2 (approx.) site to secure your lifestyle property.
The Facts
-Bonus $25,000 for HomeBuilder scheme or $45,000 for first home buyers!* Conditions Apply
575m2 (approx.) of sought-after titled land to build your dream home or investment property (STCA)
-14 metre frontage
-Stunning Hotondo-designed house and land package ready to go!
-Prime location offering a relaxed lifestyle minutes to Drysdale schools, cafes & shops
-One of the last remaining vacant allotments in this desirable and established location
-House and land packages available.
-A special project or investment - Investors and downsizers , be quick!
The Owner Loves.
The opportunity to set yourself up for your dream home in this location is ideal. It is so close to the centre of Drysdale you can walk to schools, cafés and the supermarkets

Description:
STUNNING BRAND NEW RESIDENCE!
This architecturally designed residence showcases a functional modern floorplan and is
perfectly situated in close proximity to amenities including medical centre's, supermarkets, specialty shops, restaurants and cafes. This fabulous unit has been individually designed with a strong focus on privacy, aesthetic appeal and low maintenance living for those looking to make the most of their lifestyle without compromising on creature comforts and include quality fixtures and finishes throughout plus ducted heating. With abundant storage, secure car accommodation and featuring a brilliantly spacious open plan kitchen and living area flowing out to a sunny expansive deck, this really is a fantastic opportunity for owner occupiers and investors alike! Don't miss your opportunity to secure your future on the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula with award winning wineries and stunning beaches all on your doorstep. Call today to book your inspection!
